targets.query: SELECT sum("Reads_persec") AS "Reads", sum("Writes_persec") AS "Writes" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval)
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") + sum("Writes_persec") AS "Total" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval)
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") AS "Reads", sum("Writes_persec") AS "Writes" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval)
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") + sum("Writes_persec") AS "Total" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval)
SELECT sum("Reads_persec") AS "Reads" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("Reads_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), "instance"
SELECT last("Writes_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/ AND "host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), "instance"
SELECT sum("Reads_persec"), sum("Writes_persec") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("Avg._sec/Read") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Avg._sec/Write") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Avg._sec/Read") + mean("Avg._sec/Write") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Avg._sec/Read") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$csv_volume$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Avg._sec/Write") FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT "Avg._sec/Write" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT sum("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(?:1(?:)[4-9])|(?:2[0-9])/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Disk_Reads_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(?:1(?:)[4-9])|(?:2[0-9])/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Disk_Writes_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(?:1(?:)[4-9])|(?:2[0-9])/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT sum("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(?:1(?:)[4-9])|(?:2[0-9])/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("Avg._Disk_sec/Transfer") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" != '11') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(?:1(?:)[4-9])|(?:2[0-9])/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval)
SELECT mean("Avg._Disk_sec/Transfer") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(?:1(?:)[4-9])|(?:2[0-9])/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval)
SELECT max("Avg._Disk_sec/Transfer") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" != '11') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Disk_Transfers_persec") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(?:1(?:)[4-9])|(?:2[0-9])/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval)
SELECT mean("Avg._Disk_sec/Read") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(?:1(?:)[4-9])|(?:2[0-9])/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval)

SELECT mean("Avg._Disk_sec/Transfer") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(?:1(?:)[4-9])|(?:2[0-9])/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), "instance", "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Actual Physical Drive Latency Per Node

targets.query: SELECT last("Avg._Disk_sec/Transfer") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^(1[0-2]|[0-9])$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval), "instance", "host" fill(null)
SELECT max("Avg._Disk_sec/Transfer") FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "instance" =~ /^27|28|29|30|31|32/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "instance", "host"
SELECT sum("Read_Bytes_persec") AS "Reads" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Write_Bytes_persec") AS "Writes" FROM "cluster_csv_fs" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("Disk_Read_Bytes_persec") AS "Reads" FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("Disk_Write_Bytes_persec") AS "Writes" FROM "win_diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
